item.title:
Overall, we find:
- consistent trend estimates across UK and US for distinct age groups, with higher prevalence in the US
- vaccines have a positive, but limited, benefit in reducing the prevalence of long COVID
- 7x increase between 2020 and 2022
2/ https://t.co/flkIOHIB8H
